name: 灭神
description:
"Death" is a 2D role-playing game based on the theme of oriental magic. In the game, the game as a legendary hero with different combat skills, in the fantasy continent attacked by the monster and the evil dragon, constantly smashes the conspiracy and destruction of the evil forces as the main line story, assembling equipment synthesis, suit collection, pet help, The distinctive features of the magical wing and the fun gameplay allow the player to experience a fantasy world full of oriental magical elements.

Shenwei Trial
Shenwei trials are divided into the power of Shenwei, the bloody imperial city, the worship of the city, the deterrent, and the collection of materials. Go to the St. Demon City and find the NPC "Trial Runner" of Shenwei Trial to see the details.

Star veins
The Star Vessels will appear after the eighth day of service. As the opening time is normal, the Stars will also adjust the incoming combat requirements. In the Star Trek, players can't wear or remove equipment, and can't discard any items. Death in the mystery will only drop the equipment that has already been worn, and will not drop the items in the backpack.

Rune system
Runes are sacred objects. With the blessing of runes, players can get a lot of water in the game. Today, let's take a look at the related content of the Lost Legend Rune System! Rune can add life, attack, and damage to BOSS for the character. Runes are a core component of the sacred system. When the character reaches level 130, the rune system can be activated.

Passion bubble
The land where the sages left behind, only the powerful warriors are eligible to enter. In the lost legendary passion bubble, the mysterious atmosphere will cover you. Did you sense the call of mysterious power? Every day 13:30-13:50 is the activity time of passion bubble. Players with a character level of 200 can enter the map via the NPC.
